capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is a fantastic character in the Harry Potter series. She's an amazing witch and a great role model for young witches everywhere. I mean, who wouldn't want to be as confident and powerful as her? The way she can transform into a cat at will is just incredible!
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of professor mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her   what's fascinating about her?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to wear a pair of magical square lenses that can see through them? It's just so... Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what character is behind the square lenses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed a male character in the Harry Potter series. I've always found him to be quite an intriguing figure, with his complex and sometimes intimidating demeanor. His backstory, as revealed throughout the books, adds depth to his character and makes him more relatable.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of professor snape before, can you tell me more about him?
